content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In June 2014 EPAM Password Self-Service Management tool has been launched. It allows employees (working in EPAM offices and remotely, e.g. on customer's side), as well as external users, to manage their domain accounts: unlock account, change password. This tool is accessible
